title: What are some good heroes to learn for DOTA 2?
body:
Because I know some of you people here play DOTA and I don't feel like going to their forums.

Pretty new to the game (10 whole games played), but I've played Ember/Storm Spirit, Terrorblade and Faceless Void. Looking to see who else I should try learning/who is worth learning.
.

Also, is there anywhere where I can go to find decent guides/builds?
